May 4, 1929 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
The Water Carrier
Victoria Park, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £9, 4th £6, 5th £3. March contest ("Knight of the Road") - 1st Brighouse, 2nd Holme. 7 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 9:09 p.m. Nov. 28, 2018, 12:29 p.m.

2 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe

4 Hade Edge William Pollard
